website_summaries.verdict: For a clean, non-irritating shave, the Braun does a great job.
pros: Comfortable grip and well-built design makes this shaver worth the price
The cleaning station works well, and this shaver charges quickly and holds its juice well
Five shaving modes provide a great range for different sensitivities
cons: The blades will wear down, and replacing them is expensive

website_summaries.verdict: Its performance, design, price, and features make it the best value Braun electric shaver available.
pros: A popular Braun shaver that combines a streamlined shaving head and automatic power adjusting technology for a comfortable yet close shave at a mid-range price
cons: Not quite as powerful as its Series 9 cousin, but this doesn't seem to affect the quality of the shave it provides

customer_reviews.title: My second Series 7. Love the shave.
customer_reviews.text: My second (2) Braun Series 7... My last one lasted me nearly five (5) years, finally died when I tried to replace the blades. Three (3) things I love... 1. Extremely close shave. 2. Extremely gentle shave, especially on the neck. 3. Does not leave me with bumps, red marks, or ingrown hairs. Three (3) things I like... 1. The blades last me between 12-14mo. I shave every 1-3 days. 2. The shave solution lasts me between 3-5 weeks, on average. It smells good, leaves the razor with a pleasant odor. 3. The battery lasts me several days on a trip without additional charging.
customer_reviews.author: John Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy - Updated to: - maybe buy
customer_reviews.text: The replacement blades/foil kit issue appears to have been resolved. I enjoy the razor it's self but not the cleaning unit. It became clogged causing the fluid to not circulate properly and I've been unable to unclog it. I've been manually cleaning the razor by hand for the past few years. Original post: Braun apparently discontinued the replacement blades/foil so you're throwing your money away if you buy one of these. A few 3rd party sellers currently have the replacements for double the price or more of what they were. Because of this I'm really upset with Braun and unless they correct this problem quickly I'll never purchase any of their products again.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Good shave, but slow
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't find a rotary head razor worth a darn anymore, I have a Braun travel razor that's amazing. This one will cut a nice shave. But it takes a long time with multiple passes to get the shave you want.
customer_reviews.author: Splice

customer_reviews.title: Not for cutting beards.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 77 years old. When I ordered this razor I had a beard about 3/4" long. I only shave 2 or 3 times a month so I found out quickly that this wasn't the razor for the job. I'm sure that this razor would be great for someone who shaves daily.
customer_reviews.author: Bugtussle

customer_reviews.title: Substandard results and Braun makes more money on overpriced and unnecessary “cleaning cartridges”
customer_reviews.text: Junk. I hated it. First off, I’ve tried multiple “foil” razors and have never had one that worked well. Rotary razors are much better. This one just didn’t work well. Took forever to shave - and I’m a non-hairy white guy with a beard that isn’t all that rough or thick. Next, Braun wants us to buy cartridges for the charge station so they can squeeze some monthly continuity out of you. Rotary razors are easy, open, spill out the fuzz, wash under your faucet. Done. If you want to get a substandard shave and get screwed at the same time, have at it. In the meantime, I’m shopping for a new rotary razor...
customer_reviews.author: Mike Koenigs

customer_reviews.title: part of product breaks and Amazon does not replace
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this expensive item and used it until the shaver part broke; Amazon has refused to replace the broken part, so I would have to pay over $200 to replace the whole unit. This is poor workmanship on the unit and poor customer service on the part of Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't save as close as my Norelco
customer_reviews.text: Received the Braun and tried shaving with it. I went over and over my face ( on insensitive - the closest setting), to get the closest shave it would give me. I then went over my face with my Norelco. The Norelco shaved much closer. I could also shave closer to my goatee with the Norelco. I returned the Braun.
customer_reviews.author: Corsair

customer_reviews.title: Charging cable easily slips off
customer_reviews.text: The charging cable that attaches to the braun electric razor is so LOOSE! You plug it in and it'll instantly fall off the second any little thing touches it. It's like the manufacturer didn't even think about making sure when you plug in the charger it'll stay plugged in... Really soured the experience for me. Not going to be buying Braun brand in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Torry Smith

customer_reviews.title: Mine is about to turn 3 years old.
customer_reviews.text: Mine will turn 3 years old in May. Never actually used the cleaning station to be honest. So far this electric shaver has lasted. Supposedly it’s made in Germany. I use it maybe a few times per month since my facial hair grows slow. The quality is definitely there for sure. Still using the same blade. My only complaint since day one is that it doesn’t do the neck area too well. It takes a decent amount of time to go over the neck. It’s quite annoying to be honest.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Quality Razor
customer_reviews.text: Great Razor, works like it should. Sure beats my norelco that the heads would not stay on. This razor has the German quality that you would expect, would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ronfost

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great, Not Effective
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this shaver for a few weeks now and it looks great but it just doesn't leave my skin smooth and it takes quite a bit of time to complete shaving. In the past I've used rotating blades instead of this design and the rotating blades seem to work faster while doing a better job. I wasted a lot of money on this sub-par shaver and I regret it. I will say that the auto-clean functionality of the charger base is great and does a good job. I will say the entire shaver vibrates quite a bit, like an electric massager. It's a bit ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: His Dudeness

customer_reviews.title: Best Electric Razor I've Ever Used!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this razor! As someone who enjoys a smooth face (along with my fiance), I can use this razor every day - in the shower, might I add - without getting razor burn. It is awesome! For the cleaning cartridges, I use the "Clark Shaving Co. Refill Cartridges for Braun Clean & Renew CCR, 6-Pack" here on Amazon and while the smell isn't identical to the original Braun ones, it gets the job done. Overall, if you're someone who likes shaving every day, whether for work or someone special in your life, this is the razor for you!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Not a close shave at all
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a piece of crap!! It does not get all the hair. It leaves so much behind that it takes twice as long to get it done....very frustrating!! It also spills out of the head a lot of the hair you have shaved off to leave a mess for you to clean up. What's with that? The trimmer runs so fast it tickles the mustache so much I won't use it anymore and it is hard to see what you are trimming because of the placement of it. This thing is going in the trash and I will go back to using my old Philips rotary. It still works thank god. Braun will never enter my house again!!
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Not a good shaver for African American men
customer_reviews.text: I thought Braun was a good company to by a shaver from, but clearly they have design this shaver for men with straight hair. It will give you a very smooth shave,, but you have to go over and over the same area, before the hair is completely removed. It is a very nice light weight shaver, so it does not buzz in your ear too loud. Cleaning the shaver is a breeze. you can get 4 good shavings in before the battery dies. So it is not perfect but I'll keep it
customer_reviews.author: michael mfj

customer_reviews.title: For the ladybits
customer_reviews.text: I am Josh's wife and this razor was bought for me as a gift. I'll promise you to get a nice close shave, even in tight, uneven, sensitive areas. Less issues than with the 5 blade razors I was using in these special areas. I had one years ago that I really liked (1st generation) but the ex took it with him. It gives me great please to think of him still using it knowing where I had used it, lol. I never replaced the blades or foil.
customer_reviews.author: joshua holder

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY! A razor that doesn't irritate my neck
customer_reviews.text: Used Gillette Mach III razor in the shower for years and just got tired of dealing with it. My stepdad gave me an old Norelco rotary electric and I liked how it shaved quickly and cleanly, but it irritated my neck. Since I'm not that concerned about having a super-close shave, I bought a Phillips One Razor and it didn't irritate my skin, but got tired of whiskers flying everywhere. I even tried using a cordless Wahl beard trimmer with no guide, but that caused irritation. The Braun finally came down to what I considered a fair price and I'm so glad I bought it. It shaves closely, fairly quickly and zero irritation!
customer_reviews.author: DaveSFL

customer_reviews.title: Very complex and flimsy construction - a small part destroyed itself in less than six months
customer_reviews.text: I liked the shave results but then the shave head self-destructed after less than six months and had to be replaced even though it was only used three or four times a week. I also liked the cleaning function of the base device but to have to replace a shaving head is absurd. Obviously, the reason the head isn't covered by the warranty should be a major red flag for something this expensive. Having to replace it for roughly $40 every five or six months makes this a really, really bad consumer product.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This is the most expensive shaver I’ve ever owned, and the worst. The ugly, unwieldy charging/cleaning station must be refilled regularly with fluid that smells like cheap after shave. If you elect to clean it by rinsing, you must then oil it with machine oil! So... you can smell like your grandfather or like an oil change station. It won’t hold a charge and it shaves about as well as any other, much cheaper shaver, no better. In short, an overbuilt, under-performing waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: PaulG

customer_reviews.title: Not For Sensitive Skin, period!!
customer_reviews.text: This razor is definitely not for sensitive skin!! I tried to return it but Amazon's policy is that it is un-returnable, wish I would have know this before I purchased. Razor causes cuts in rough areas of my face. My Panasonic does not do this so I am convinced the razor head is the problem. DO NOT PURCHASE THIS MODEL IF YOU HAVE ANYTHING OTHER THAN PERFECTLY SMOOTH SKIN!!! Since you can't return it, you'll waste your money on this one if it cuts you.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A.

customer_reviews.title: Expect about 60% of the advertised lifespan.
customer_reviews.text: I've had mine for 3-4 yrs and they are suppose to last 7-9 yrs. Mine needs to be replaced by Amazon, as the lifespan is not accurate! The silver plastic is now peeling off. Foil has one large hole that the cleaning station may have cleaner that's too strong.
customer_reviews.author: ABC

customer_reviews.title: First time using electric shaver
customer_reviews.text: I've always used razor blade my entire life, so I was extremely excited to switch over to an electric shaver. The shave isn't as smooth as using a razor in my opinion, but maybe I'm using it wrong? Nonetheless, the product is painless, and glides across my face well. I've yet to use the cleaning station, but it seems quite innovative. The shaver tells you when you need to put it through the cleaning station. I have sensitive skin, and after the first use I did not notice any bumps, so I'd recommend this to those looking for an electric shaver!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Best all around shaver you can get
customer_reviews.text: Compared this with the Arc5 and the reviews are right. The Arc5 if you just stay to next day stubble shaves faster and closer. The downside is it struggles more with longer growth, I've never had shaver burn but this razor for me required a pre-shave lotion. Also the Arc5, perhaps due to it's extra closer shave caused more ingrown hairs. The Braun shaved almost as close, faster for longer growth and didn't cause any shave irritation, require a pre-shave lotion, or ingrown hairs.
customer_reviews.author: ToddTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Minimal efficiency / $85.00 replacement head NOT covered in warrantee!
customer_reviews.text: Expensive initial cost [$160.00], minimal efficiency, lousy warrantee - 30 days via Amazon, 2 years limited warrantee from maker Braun. "LIMITED" for a reason: the shaver [detachable] foil & blades [head] are NOT covered and are the first part of the unit to break [Which is undoubtedly why that specific part is NOT covered in the warrantee! The worst part of all this is that that single minimal part cost $85.00 to replace in [my case] less than one year! NEVER AGAIN. I bought it because reviews said it was the best, BUT they only [evidently] base their reviews on function and not one practical ownership.
customer_reviews.author: G. Middeke

customer_reviews.title: Best shaver I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: I graduated from an old Series 3. So happy to have the Series 7. I don't really have sensitive skin, but now I feel pampered by how comfortable and close the shave is. It also feels like my shaves are now twice as fast, which I appreciate. The bundled cleaning station was a great bonus, and the shaver's on-board battery life and hygiene indicators take the guesswork out of knowing when to clean and charge the razor. I ended up making my own cleaning solution using alcohol and the Essential Values Shaver & Razor Cleaner Concentrate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: CANNOT RETURN
customer_reviews.text: I was gonna rate this 3* as i don't think it's the machines fault entirely. I simply seem to have a kind of hair that electric razors just aren't able to cut very effectively. I believe 3* was generous, since for $200, i was expecting nothing short of perfection. Alas, that was not the case. However, just now I'm told that this item can't (let me say that again... CAN NOT)be return because it has alcohol in it, which is flamable and goes against amazon policy. Therefore, i spent $200 on an item that is not good for me and i can't return. $200 to the garbage. And that earns them the 1*. They would get 0* if i could.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Part Cheap Part Ineffective
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brand new a few months ago and am disappointed: It doesn't provide me an even close shave even on the closest setting. I've stretched my skin tight, tried circular motions, angles and after all this my cheapie Schick 3 disposable blade perform better (which is what I used for years) The Lock button broke on the shaver. The head can no longer stay in place. I will give it an average for battery life. I just wouldn't want anyone to spend this much and be so unimpressed
customer_reviews.author: PeaceLoveHappiness

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Fast shave
customer_reviews.text: Nice ,Fast shave ,gets close to nostrils ,unlike my old 7505 Braun I bought Jan. 21,2004 . But that said this new model  Does not hold a candle to my old 7505 series ( in Craftsmanship ! The Pop-up trimmer was ten times better, it was sturdier, better designed and easier to use on the 7505 . The 790cc's pop-up trimmer feels flimsy ,awkward and very cheap !! Also the lock is positioned on the head of the shaver also flimsy .That is why I took away 1 star . I doubt I will get 12 years out of it like my old 7505 !!
customer_reviews.author: Mark 5

customer_reviews.title: Close shave
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant about the 7 series. I was conflicted between the 7 & 9 and after a good amount of research & video comparisons I decided to go with this 7 series. I had an old 3 series with the cleaning station. I loved it I was in need of a new shaver with a cleaning station. I've only had it a few days now and I love how quickly and close the shave is. I had a 4 day grow and took about 5 mins to completely shave away (which is normal) I love how quiet the shaver is.
customer_reviews.author: Dom

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Shaver
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Braun shaver. The first one lasted over 10 years, and although it was still working fine, when time came to replace the head I opted for a new shaver because I don't know how long the rechargeable batteries will last. The cleaning system works really well and makes it a shave and forget system. Comfortable shaves. Will probably buy another one ten years from ow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Shaver, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the Norelco shavers I have used for over 40 years. Did not think I would like a shaver that was not a rotary, this Braun Shaver proved that wrong. Really well built product. I recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: Niksurfs

customer_reviews.title: Clean shave
customer_reviews.text: 4 years have struggled with ingrown hairs how about the highest in razors shaving creams aftershave Jaws exfoliator went to doctors nothing worked only other option was multiple laser treatments until my dermatologist recommended a shaver like this it has the self cleaning covenants and Replacements available this thing does a great job easy to clean easy to care for and it definitely cuts down on the ingrown hairs if you're having to shave every single day would definitely recommend I've had it for a year and no real complaints definitely would buy again
customer_reviews.author: cjamazon8

customer_reviews.title: The best is slipping
customer_reviews.text: This unit is a good one but you can tell Braun is starting to get cheap. 12 months in and she is falling apart. Braun please correct this.
customer_reviews.author: David Jarzynka

customer_reviews.title: Great close shave!
customer_reviews.text: Love tis razor. I have been a Panasonic user for years and have loved them but even after using my panasonic I had to hit the trouble spots on my face with a hand razor. No more with the Braun. I get a great close shave and do not need to go over any area with a hand razor. Maybe because it's new but even with replacement blades on my panasonic that didn't happen. Love the cleaner, replacement solution is not expensive. Get one!
customer_reviews.author: Marty V.

customer_reviews.title: good for course stubble
customer_reviews.text: My husband is in his 50's and requested an electric shaver. I bought this one bc of the cleaning feature. He loves it. He has a very thick course beard that he recently shaved completely off bc of the corona virus. He uses this shaver to shave his tender skin. He says nothing will replace a good ol razor but now he only has to shave with a regular razor once a week. The electric razor does well getting stubble removed and his face feels smooth to me and is less irritated. He hasn't had it long enough to give a review on the battery life.
customer_reviews.author: bren

customer_reviews.title: Best electric I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I'm VERY pleased with this razor. While still not as close as a blade, it gives the best shave I've ever had from an electric razor. The only thing I wish were different would be access to the blades inside the cartridge for cleaning, but that's pretty minor given the great performance thus far. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A Collier

customer_reviews.title: Great for older people!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this razor back in July for my 92 yr old father. All other razors would not shave his sensitive skin, and the fouls kept cutting up his face, and had to be replaced every 2 weeks. Ordered this because of the reviews I read on line, said it was good for older men. He said it is the best and closest shave he has ever had. It is super easy to clean and he can operate it with ease. SO worth the money, wish I would have found this one a year ago! I would highly recommend especially if it is for an older person with thin sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: ld

customer_reviews.title: The "Clean&Charge Station" is not necessary
customer_reviews.text: The shaver could be sold without the Clean&Charge Station. It is just a way to milk more money out of the consumer to buy the cleaning fluid for life. You can clean and charge the shaver without this piece of junk that just takes up space on you bathroom counter. I don't use it at all and the shaver is working perfectly without having to fool around with it. Shame on you Braun!
customer_reviews.author: bobbyboy

customer_reviews.title: Defective razor.
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very unhappy with this razor that I purchased for Christmas. The head is not guaranteed and that's what keeps failing. He has already replaced the head once and it did the exact same thing again. It starts making horrible noises right away and the two springs fall out right away. He's had other Braun's and never had a problem but this one is a dud. He has gone back to his old cheap Norelco and is very disappointed. He feels that the body is defective as it keeps destroying the head. What should I do? This is not a cheap razor. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Peg Buckman

customer_reviews.title: Nothing ground breaking.
customer_reviews.text: It's a solid razor but honestly not worth twice the price of the norelco I've been using up til now. Still need multiple passes to get my neck and under my chin. It feels just a "plasticy" as my norelco although the blades appear a little more high quality. The cleaning station is a total gimmick and money grab to keep you on the hook buying cleaning solution. The base feels like the most poorly constructed part. I liken it to a cheep kids party toy made in China. It's definitely a noticeably better shave just not sure it's worth the money. I could get the same shave with my old razor, just took a little more effort.
customer_reviews.author: jptsr1

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have spent years trying many lower cost options on shavers and never being very happy with them. I finally decided to splurge and spend the money on this braun and I am so glad I did. This razor is so much better than the other razors I have tried, and I believe it comes down to how powerful the motor is. This Braun really cuts fast and it guves a good shave. No electric razor will ever cut as close as a handheld blade, but for convenience and for people like me who have skin that is too sensitive for a blade, this Braun is the perfect solution.
customer_reviews.author: D.H.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shave
customer_reviews.text: I've been using electric shavers for over 40 years, including Remington, Norelco, Panasonic, and Braun series 3 and 5. In general, I prefer the linear shavers, and Braun in particular. The series 7 is by far the best shaver I've ever used. Shaves are quick, close and comfortable, even when I skip a day on the weekend. I found with the series 5 that it is not necessary to use the cleaner, with the expensive solution, daily. I just clean when it's time to charge.
customer_reviews.author: JSmith

customer_reviews.title: I hate electric shavers
customer_reviews.text: Basically, I hate electric shavers, but this is by far the best I've found. A pretty good shave, though it seems to take a bit longer than using a blade. What I really like is the cleaning feature. I couldn't believe how well the shaver cleans itself. After the first cleaning, I opened it up and it looked like it just came from the factory! Incredible. This is the one I will keep.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Hinman

customer_reviews.title: Liked my previous series 5 better
customer_reviews.text: Liked my previous series 5 better. This razor works fine, but I liked the trimmer and cleaning action on the previous shaver better. It is no longer available, so I bought this one as I like the quality of Braun. It works fine, shaves fine, and is of good quality. I just liked the position of the trimmer better on the previous model better and this new one does not get any where near as clean in the clean and renew base.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Ordini

customer_reviews.title: Good razor
customer_reviews.text: Electric razors don't work great on me. I have stubble as soon as I shave. Part of the problem is that I never wanted to spend too much on a shaver. I decided to spend a bit extra and am glad I did. This shaver does a great job with the face but just an okay job on my neck. It takes awhile each morning of shaving in various directions to get my neck presentable. That being said, I'm very glad I got this product.
customer_reviews.author: dwe1978

customer_reviews.title: Great shaver
customer_reviews.text: Great shaver for my beard. I shave daily so it manages my beard growth with ease. This model is a huge improvement from my previous Brain model. Does not irritate and I like the swivel head. I have had no issues so I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Juan B

customer_reviews.title: Great Shaver!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his Braun Electric Shaver, Series 7. It shaves almost as close as a blade and leaves his face smooth and soft. One of the greatest things about it is the auto cleaning function. It comes with everything to auto-clean it--just put the shaver in the holder and it does all the work for you; you don't have to brush out whiskers or try to rinse stuff out. It holds a charge for quite awhile--we went on a week's vacation and he never had to use the cord. Definitely the nicest electric shaver he's ever had.
customer_reviews.author: B. Molden

customer_reviews.title: Best shave device I have ever purchased!
customer_reviews.text: I have always purchased cheaper shavers with the 3 rotary heads and figured it was time to step up and pay extra, well it was well worth it. I'm kicking myself that I didn't purchase it years ago. Shaver is the best shave I have had in 20 years. I was concerned about moving from a triple rotary to the foil head, if your wondering how difficult it is to make the shift, wonder no longer, make the shift, you will be glad you did! The base charger and cleaner is amazing and leaves the device clean and ready for use every day. Best shave, in the shortest time with a great functioning shaver.
customer_reviews.author: thebigreader

customer_reviews.title: Great Shaving Machine
customer_reviews.text: This machine is very good at shaving and does not leave that rash sensation on my skin. The only reason I remove a star is because some areas the machine does not cut very well and I still need to pass my Mach3 shaver close to the Adams apple. I also use some shaving cream, since the first time I dint use and it was an horrible experience because of my sensitive skin. The last comment that I have is that I need to use the high speed on this because lower ones don't cut all the hair as I want from my face. my hair is under the category of African American.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shave
customer_reviews.text: I was a little apprehensive about spending over 200 bucks on a razor. When I received I couldn't wait to shave. This razor is off the charts, it cleans and lubes itself, a display for hygiene and charging, and the wash chooses which one is relevant to the amount of dirt on the razor. I use it on my bald head and it's a nice smooth shave. I've tried it wet and dry. Great razor and I love all the bells and whistles.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Carney

customer_reviews.title: WILL NOT SHAVE WELL
customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT THIS BECAUSE OF REVIEWS AND WAS VERY DISAPPOINTED. IT DOES NOT SHAVE WELL AND GETS HOT ON BLADE SURFACE AFTER A FEW MINUTES. I TRIED THE DIFFERENT SETTINGS AND IT DID NOT WORK WELL, SO I HAVE GONE BACK TO USING MY OTHER BRAND SHAVER THAT IS 5 YEARS OLD AND WORKS BETTER. TRIMMING A MUSTACHE IS TERRIBLE BECAUSE YOU CAN NOT SEE THE MUSTACHE WHEN YOU OPEN THE TRIMMER . IT BLOCKS YOU FROM SEEING WHAT YOU ARE DOING.
customer_reviews.author: diego feliciano

customer_reviews.title: Great electric razor. Close shave.
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated for years not wanting to spend the money for a new razor. Mine was from the mid 12th century and even after replacing the blades, it still didn't not shave well. After doing some research online I decided to spring for this model. I loved the first shave. My old one hit the basket in seconds. The positive reviews were true. The self-cleaning feature is great also.
customer_reviews.author: Gatlin

customer_reviews.title: Best electric razor for the money
customer_reviews.text: I have semi limited experience with electric razors and I have what I consider sensitive skin. Where I work I am required to shave every day so the budget razors from Wally World are the only ones I have tried. They did ok but never a really close shave like a manual razor. This series 7 does an amazing job and is adjustable on closeness of shave. The cleaning station does a great job as well.
customer_reviews.author: DIY Family

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't tug and feels great when shaving!
customer_reviews.text: I've had a few other electric razors but never spent much on them. After shelling out a little more cash for this one, I will never go back to a cheaper razor. It shaves well and I really enjoy the built-in trimmer. I like the adjustable head that can be locked when shaving sideburns or moustache, and the cleaning machine stand is great. It makes you feel like you're using a new razor after each clean. The travel case is a great bonus especially if you travel often. Highly recommend this razor!
customer_reviews.author: JT Prather

customer_reviews.title: HAVEN'T BEEN ABLE TO FIND A SHAVER THAT WORKS GREAT?  SEARCH NO MORE!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried more than six shavers to no avail. My beard is course and I just couldn't get a smooth shave. Now I made the ONLY selection that works! No kidding! As smooth as a new razor blade with plenty of shaving cream. Really! Expensive compared to all others I have bought and returned, but worth every penny! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: JON MEREDITH

customer_reviews.title: loud buzzy
customer_reviews.text: for price (or even cheap razor), I was not expecting volume or level of buzziness. It is loud enough to be noticeable in bedroom when I am in bath room. It is not a pleasant buzz sound either. Quality of shave was disappointing, I follow up with my old electric razor I was replacing. Self cleaning feature seems to work. Trimmer function works ok. at this price I was expecting a lot better. Returning this one.
customer_reviews.author: J Craig Rutledge

customer_reviews.title: Decent shaver
customer_reviews.text: Shaver works very well and charges shaver as required. The cleaning portion of the system never worked as designed. The LED indicator always says the shaver needs a deep clean cycle. Seems this is not working and the shaver comes out soaking wet with cleaning solution and the cleaning LCD indicator on the shaver never change. Thankfully I kept the charging and cleaning stand from my old shaver as I works as it should. I would not buy this set up again.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shave fast to clean and excellent self sanitizing System.
customer_reviews.text: I am 100% permanently and totally disabled. Everything in life is painful. But this shaver takes less time to shave and less time to clean it after each shave and it is the first razor to come with a self sanitizing system. Braun has taken a lot of time and pain out of the whole shaving and grooming process for me. That is a quality of life blessing! It also does a fantastic job on my face so my beard and goatee have never looked better and look professionally done. Thank you Braun. The best shaver Available in the market today.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad, But I Feel Like There's Better Products Out There.
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad product by no means, but I don't think it's worth its price. The cutting is sometimes nowhere as good as a regular blade. This is more like a quick trim. The charging and having to clean can be quick if you have something to do for like 20 minutes, so it doesn't bother me. If you're feeling lazy to move your arms, then I recommend this product. Otherwise, you could probably do finer cuts with a blade you probably already have lying around the house. (Edit: can't believe this review was hidden because of sensitivity?)
customer_reviews.author: SACichlid

customer_reviews.title: Not for ingrown hair
customer_reviews.text: Razors are tricky. I bought this for my fiancé with hopes it would help with his ingrown hairs. It didn’t help and actually made him break out more with more redness and ingrowns. Everyone’s skin type is different. I hope one day I can find a razor for him that actually helps.
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: Great Electric razor
customer_reviews.text: I have never used an Electric Razor, 1st for me and just trying to get use to it. I think it will be fine but like anything it will take a little time. Doesn't seem to shave as close as a Gillette razor Ive used in the past but does a good job and practice using it will be the true test. Its easy to clean and the charge seems to last forever. Think anyone trying this razor will like it especially those who already use electric razors. Will probably give it a 5 once Im use to it.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Kiser

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't shave properly
customer_reviews.text: I'm thoroughly disappointed in this electric shaver. After reading the reviews, I thought it would be ideal for dry shaving. I'm prone to get razor bumps, as my coarse and curly hair creates ingrown hairs, but this doesn't shave at all. I looked at the instructions manual to make sure I wasn't doing something wrong, but it doesn't suggest that I am. I'm upset because I cannot return it. What a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Forrest Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: save your money, stick to a razor blade for a MUCH better and cheaper shave
customer_reviews.text: I guess I had hoped after all these years that electric shavers had improved, but even though this product got decent reviews in many publications (as did others) this one did NOT give a good shave at all. Additionally, the cleaning system is BIG and bulky, takes up a lot of counter space, is NOISY and requires you keep buying their cleaning product refills in future. What a HUGE hassle! I've gone back to my blade and chalked this up to a bad idea/experience and inferior product that's cumbersome and ineffective.
customer_reviews.author: DVC

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This Braun shaver is overpriced and under performs relative to Norelco shavers available it half the price. The cleaning solution seemed designed more as a revenue stream than anything else. Why not just use water or rubbing alcohol to clean it? The electric razor is simple is not effective for me. It not does not provide a close shave, taking too long to produce a minimally effective shave. I find it heavy in the hand a clumsy to maneuver. Clearly I am not a fan and I regret my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: THE Brian

customer_reviews.title: ok!
customer_reviews.text: I got this electric shaver for my dad! I thought it was too complicated for him to set up and get it going! I personally think the whole sterilizer tub and all that is too much and unnecessary! The instructions say that the alcohol will run out in a month and I don't think my dad would replace it anyway! He is happy with the shaver itself. I would say don't waste your money on the extra stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy, non returnable, try a different one!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy! Lots of hype, head is bulky hard to do details. Misses more hair then my old old Norelco. Save your money buy something else. Wanted to Return Amazon says contains flammable materials cannot return. Stuck with it. Comes with sanitizing cartridge won’t last long, then they want to sell you more.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Tschetter

customer_reviews.title: Use it everyday
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect before the braun I used a phillips and with the phillips i would get razor burn with the braun i can push as hard or as soft as i wont and not have any issues with my sensitive skin. Its definitely nice to have its own base station to clean and charge it automatically.
customer_reviews.author: Tomas Deleon

customer_reviews.title: Battery died far too quickly.
customer_reviews.text: 2 star deductions for: I've used this shaver for just over a year now. I understand that electric shavers will never be as close as blades but this shaver takes 3-5 times longer than a blade to get a reasonably close shave. Requiring a proprietary cleaning/lubrication solution is also disappointing. After 1 shave the shaver hygiene indicator loses 2 dots. It must be time based. The blade cartridge is really difficult to get clean with a brush. On the plus side: it feels solid, shaves comfortably and has great battery life. Update: I removed another 2 stars. In less than 2 years - the battery will not hold a charge overnight. It's no longer a cordless razor.
customer_reviews.author: Brett V

customer_reviews.title: A Great shaver
customer_reviews.text: After years of using a Norelco shaver I decided to switch to see if I could get a closer shave and man does this razor perform. I don't have a heavy beard but I noticed that after just one shave, I almost did not even need to shave the next day. It far outshines Norelco! So far I am very pleased and feel it is worth the additional cost. You do get what you pay for and this is a quality razor!
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Buy this not that
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had this for a month and my face feels so much better than when I was using my Phillips. My last razor would turn my skin red and irritate it constantly. I was hesitant to buy this based on how expensive it was. My roommate told me all good things so I figured I would spend it on something that will last me. I don’t regret my purchase. I would say the downfall is that the hygiene level drops pretty fast which means you have to clean it more which means you have to replace the cleaning cartridge more often which runs around $17 for a pack of three. :)
customer_reviews.author: alexmichael

customer_reviews.title: Not a good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for Father's Day. Although my father was a good sport, this razor NEVER worked. I had spent a lot of time checking reviews on Amazon & thought that I had made a good purchase. It is so ineffective that it just sits on the cabinet. I hate to throw it away, but will do that eventually. In the meantime, I am returning to the former brand. I had thought that I was upgrading, but this was a huge disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband for Xmas because he struggles finding a razor that doesn’t irritate his skin (and he likes the self cleaning feature) and he loves this! He’s been using it awhile now and it’s amazing. I will say it’s a little loud and so is the self cleaning part but we got used to it. It’s worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Charissa S.

customer_reviews.title: Finally an Electric Razor that works
customer_reviews.text: At 67 this is the first time I have used an electric razor that gives me a good close shave. Having thick facial hair those other brands were a chore to use, with their tiny little holes that hair is supposed to fit in. This appears to cut it asll very well. A couple of passes and the job is done. I also like the cleaning station.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrill Thorne

customer_reviews.title: Love the self cleaning but it stinks!
customer_reviews.text: Whatever solution this comes with for cleaning does not make a pleasant shaving experience when trying to shave. As the fumes rip through your nostrils, it's quite ridiculous. The blades are good but hard to hit those spots on the bottom of your neck line where the hairs never get shaved no matter how hard you press or what angles you shave at. Overall it's ok.
customer_reviews.author: Buffy

customer_reviews.title: Brawn Series 7 a Top Choice
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Braun series 7, and this one is even better than my last, which I used for some seven years. It shaves better, with close shaves and minimal irritation. The battery life is amazing; you can go weeks without recharging if needed. I don’t think you can go wrong with this choice in an electric razor.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kraft

customer_reviews.title: #1 Choice for Black Men
customer_reviews.text: To all my brothers out there with the dark itchy razor bumps, this is the product for you! I'm an authentic user; no gimmicks. Just brought it a couple of weeks ago. And it is AMAZING! When I used the standard razors, I started to form dark marks on my face and neck. Many of the African American males in my circle experienced a similar issue. This is because our skin is too sensitive for regular razors. It cuts the hairs too deep, so the hair grows back ingrown into the skin. REAL TALK: Invest in yourself. Nobody wants to go around with spotted, itchy skin (or see that).
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Great for us bald gent's who like queballesque noggins
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a head shaver (I am of the bald variety) and am blown away. Never used to shave my head, but I took the plunge and bought this to try out the style. It takes me about 10 minutes to shave my entire head... it takes me longer to shave. Not only does this do a great job of getting my fuzz off, it makes my head buttery smooth. I had never been an electric razor guy before, but this really sealed the deal. Bravo Braun.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great product 👍
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this shaver, easy on the skin, has several settings for comfort and is easy to clean and maintain. The cleaning/charging station is great and easy to use, cleaning cartridges seem to last a good while. Shaver gets nearly as close as using a razor without giving me cuts and bumps
customer_reviews.author: Brad T.

customer_reviews.title: Braun shaver experience
customer_reviews.text: Shaver does'nt work properly. Locking system is defective and cleaning system does not work!! I contacted Braun and they refused to do anything,only advised to contact an independent shaver Co. I called the service co and they were 8 weeks behind. My brand new shaver would be unusable for at least 2 months. The service co was totally disinterested and told me it was my responsibility to package , pay and send the shaver to them.I'm done with Braun!!
customer_reviews.author: Jan Noel

customer_reviews.title: Top Rated!
customer_reviews.text: Braun user for many years... needed a new shaver, looked at top reviews and the Braun series 7 was always amongst the best. Once I received it, it did not disappoint! Good build, fantastic shave! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Chad B

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but apparently worth it
customer_reviews.text: I guess I haven't updated my electric razor in a long time. This one is the real deal. Granted, I have semi-wimpy facial hair, so it's not like shaving the Amazon forest. Nevertheless, I have always used my hand razor to finish the job until this electric razor. It's pretty expensive, but maybe it'll pay for itself someday by me no longer buying rip off Schick razor blades. No regrets except "cleaning unit" is kind of a pain. Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Johnboy, Texas

customer_reviews.title: IA very good shaver.
customer_reviews.text: The Braun shaver has many features all of which work well. It comes with a separate electrical shaver cleaner, which I saw as novel. Everything works well,l although my first one, the cleaner didn't seem to work. I later found out it was just the electrical cord that was faulty. The cord is separate. The more complicated cleaning device for both sets worked well. I am quite happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: I've only had this shaver for a little over a ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this shaver for a little over a year and now the replacement foils are no longer available or are being scalped at outrageous prices on bidding sites. If you don't believe me do a search for P/N 70S. Even Braun doesn't have them!! Skip this product. It has no support from Braun. I'm going to Panasonic or Norelco. Companies that support their products for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Davidd

customer_reviews.title: dont buy.
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a couple years and I am sorry i wasted the money on it. Doesnt cut well and leaks whiskers out the side of the head. I will be going back to Norelco.
customer_reviews.author: oscar

customer_reviews.title: Great shaves, great battery life, awkward trimmer
customer_reviews.text: The best shaver I've used by far, produces a very close, smooth shave, very quickly. I like the cleaning machine, keeps the shaver nice and fresh. Took the shaver on vacation with me over two weeks in length, shaved every day, and still had some battery left when I returned, much better than my past shavers. I find the trimmer a bit awkward to use, the way it sticks out of the front of the shaver makes it more difficult to get to some areas, but it is still usable.
customer_reviews.author: xkss

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: The razor was fine, but the cleaning unit continually malfunctioned. Unit constantly showed the cleaning cartridges were empty when in fact they were full and after 2 seconds, the cleaning procedure stopped. The entire package was returned to Braun for a refund as they have a 100 day guarantee. Still awaiting payment
customer_reviews.author: Alan Sheinman

customer_reviews.title: Good value, very close shave
customer_reviews.text: I don't know about longevity, I've had this a month or two. I'm a woman with some stubborn coarse chin hairs and I also shave all the fuzz off my face. This makes it baby soft and I feel like a woman again. The self cleaning makes it even more worth it, don't have to worry about keeping the shavers lubed. It's expensive but worth every penny for my confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Morgaine

customer_reviews.title: Shaves well, shaves easy
customer_reviews.text: I've not used many electric shavers. Mostly because they all suck. I have soft hair, which is apparently a problem when it comes to electric shavers. This one works. It could be a closer shave, and I get a closer shave with a rotary, but it's "good enough" and doesn't cause my sensitive skin any irritation. The whole cleaning/charging stand is awesome. The popup trimmer is utterly terrifying, as the angle it sits at means that the foils will be close to something you don't want them close to. I use a separate trimmer to avoid using the popup on this shaver.
customer_reviews.author: JMusic

customer_reviews.title: closest shave ever
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my son and he says it is the closest shave he has ever had. light and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Closest shave ever with an electric shaver.
customer_reviews.text: This is the most money I've ever spent on an electric razor, I've tried them before but was never happy with them. I bought this razor because I'm going in the hospital and won't be able to stand at the sink to shave. I can't believe how close of a shave I get with it. I'm so happy with it, I wish I'd of bought it a long time ago. Goodbye safety razors, in time I'll get my money back using the Braun. The cleaning station works well and I like that I can charge the razor without the cleaning station, that will come in handy for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Chief

customer_reviews.title: Best Electric I have used & I am only half German
customer_reviews.text: Never a big electric shaver fan for close, non skin-irritating shave. Tried all the major brands Remington, Panasonic, Norelco over the years for a fast cleanup shave in AM or PM. Always same result, not particularly close& caused skin irritation, especially in hard to shave areas for men: jawline, neck. Until this German Designed razor. First impression: super close..really easy on skin. almost as good as a razor+shaving cream shave (my preference) without the mess. Cost a bit more , but worth the price if you value your skin & like a fast close shave.
customer_reviews.author: TDS

customer_reviews.title: which works 10 times better. VERY disappointed in the product
customer_reviews.text: It simply doesn't do the job. I've spent 45 minutes going over and over my face and it just doesn't work. I had to use a blade razor just to make it tolerable. I've also purchased a much cheaper model, which works 10 times better. VERY disappointed in the product, and very disappointed that I find it isn't returnable only AFTER I buy it. Thanks a lot, Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Odum

customer_reviews.title: The best Shaver I have Ever Owned
customer_reviews.text: This shaver is a bit more expensive than others but the quality makes it worth every cent. The quality of shave is excellent and what really makes it stand out for me is the cleaning base station. Just place the shaver in the base station and it gets cleaned, sterilized and recharged leaving it ready for the next use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not deliver! Overpriced does not give a close nor smooth shave.
customer_reviews.text: Bruan use to make the greatest shavers but that is no longer the case. You have to go over and over yourface for this to shave, and it leaves hairs all over you face making you go back over and over which eventualky irritates your skin. After buying this I also ordered the norelco which I prefer the shape of the bruan the norelco is a much beter shaver. I also noticed that the razors motor sounds forced not like previous models.
customer_reviews.author: momo

customer_reviews.title: Close Shave
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an Andis shaver that you no longer can purchase or get replacement parts with this Braun, and I have only had the shaver for a couple of weeks, but so far very good! It is easy to use, it's quite and easy to clean. I would recommend and buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Go Navy!

customer_reviews.title: My First E-Shaver. Wow.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first electric shaver and Wow... I put this through the ringer for its first shave. I had a 4 day Wolf Face, and it's so counterintuitive to shave against the hair and DRY! I was nervous about mincing my chin or my upper lip, but this thing really gave me one of the closest shaves I have ever had. I Highly recommend this shaver if you're thinking about an alternative to a Mach 3. Although, I still Mach my skull. Only regret is that I should habe paid attention and bought the wet shaver to shave in the shower, rather than the dry-shave only model.
customer_reviews.author: Myles B Dyson

customer_reviews.title: Five months after purchase.....
customer_reviews.text: ...this razor is cutting my face. There is something in the head that is both sharp and sticks out. I have not dropped or otherwise abused the razor. I am no longer using it. I am not going to spend seventy to eighty dollars a year replacing the head.
customer_reviews.author: wfb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shaver -- It's a Braun what do you expect
customer_reviews.text: This shaver is my go-to of many I own. I own many other brands and I always end with Braun for that extremely close shave. This product comes with the self-cleaning system which is great so you always know your shaver is sanitized. Great system. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark X

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the cost.
customer_reviews.text: I have not been satisfied with this electric razor. I didn't like it from the first use, but figured I should give it time. Honestly, it was a waste of money. I always have to clean up my shave with a handheld razor after using this electronic razor. I previously had a very cheap three circle razor that worked just as well, if not better - especially on my neck.
customer_reviews.author: SamTheMan

customer_reviews.title: cleaning solution
customer_reviews.text: razor works awesome but when I went to put in the cleaner solution the container was empty, received that way now I have no way of cleaning the razor head, looks like quality control skipped a beat, any suggestions for my issue, don't won't to pay an additional 35.00 plus for refills yet??????????????
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Never say Never
customer_reviews.text: I have been a steel razor shaver for 60 years. I needed to switch to an electric, and this lives up to its reviews. I must say, my shave is not as close as a wet razor, but I think it unfair to compare the two types of shaving. I am happy with this. I love the sterilization bath the heads are given after a shave.
customer_reviews.author: Buzz

product_meta.title: Braun Electric Razor for Men, Series 7 790cc Electric Shaver with Precision Trimmer, Rechargeable, Wet & Dry Foil Shaver, Clean & Charge Station and Travel Case
product_meta.description:
Style Name:790ccThe Braun Series 7 790cc-4 electric foil shavers have the world’s only intelligent Sonic technology that automatically increases power in difficult areas. Powered by a lithium ion battery, the Braun Series 7 790cc electric shaver is the smart choice for the discerning man. Significantly gentler and more efficient than any rotary shaver, the Series 7 electric razor contours to the curves of your face with flexible blades on a fully pivoting head for maximum coverage. This electric shaver also adapts to your beard density, using up to 10,000 micro vibrations per minute when needed. With less strokes and pressure required while shaving, the results are smooth skin without the skin irritation. And as the Series 7 electric razors shave as close as 0.05mm, as thin as half a human hair, that smoothness lasts longer, for a highly efficient and superior shave. The electric shaver also comes with a Clean&Charge station, the world's only 5- action alcohol-based system that hygiencially cleans, charges, and lubricates the blades and shaver. Engineered, tested and made in Germany, you are guaranteed exceptional performance every day, for up to 7 years. The best environmental temperature for charging is between 41 degree Fahrenheit to 95 degree Fahrenheit / 5 degree Celsius to 35 degree Celsius. Do not expose the shaver to temperatures higher than 122 degree Fahrenheit / 50 degree Celsius for extended periods of time.

MANUFACTURER CONTACT INFORMATION
Monday – Friday (8AM – 4:30PM) @ (800) BRAUN-11 for more details on usage or refer to the website for usage instructions to help address any existing issues.
feature_bullets: Intelligent Sonic technology automatically increases power while shaving in difficult areas and on denser hair
The Series 7 electric razor comes with an ActiveLift trimmer that captures flat-lying hairs in problem areas
OptiFoil cuts hair as short as 0.05mm for perfect closeness
Synergized foil and blades give you a perfect shave with Series 7 razors
100% waterproof shavers for easy cleaning. ActiveLift trimmer captures flat-lying hairs in problem areas

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
